member.name: M:LightSwitchApplication.DataWorkspace.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of a DataWorkspace. Changes can be made to data sources in the new instance independent of changes made to data sources in the default DataWorkspace.

member.summary: Gets the ApplicationData datasource. This provides members to query and update data in the data source.

member.summary: Allows users to edit engineer records

member.name: F:LightSwitchApplication.Permissions.CanEditBaseData
member.summary: Allows users to edit status, priority, and department codes

member.name: F:LightSwitchApplication.Permissions.CanRunIssueSearch
member.summary: Allows users to open the Issue Search Screen

member.name: F:LightSwitchApplication.Permissions.CanModifyClosedIssues
member.summary: Allows users to set the status of issues to closed

member.name: F:LightSwitchApplication.Permissions.CanChangeIssueDescription
member.summary: Allows users to change the issue text

member.name: F:LightSwitchApplication.Permissions.CanMantainSystemSetup
member.summary: Allows users to open the System Setup Screen

member.name: F:LightSwitchApplication.Permissions.CanAssignIssueToEngineer
member.summary: Allows users to assign issues to engineers

member.name: F:LightSwitchApplication.Permissions.CanUpdateUsers
member.summary: Allows users to update the User table

member.name: F:LightSwitchApplication.Permissions.CanBypassValidation
member.summary: Allows users to save records with Validation Errors

member.name: F:LightSwitchApplication.Permissions.CanViewAllIssues
member.summary: Allows users to view all issues
